Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.persistence
     
  • Class
    Description
    ClientPinger
    Class that pings the client to check if the connection is still alive
    Connection
    Abstract class that creates a new connection between server and client (server side)
    GameLobby
    Class GameLobby is the class that represents the game lobby of a single game.
    GlobalLobby
    Class that represents the Global Lobby of the server that contains all the games in progress or waiting to be created and the players that have just successfully connected (with unique username) and have not yet decided what to do.
    RMIConnection
    RMI connection class that creates a new RMI connection between server and client (server side)
    RMIHandler
    RMI handler interface that is sent to the client to communicate with the server
    RMIHandlerImplementation
    RMI handler implementation that creates a new RMI connection between server and client (server side)
    RMIServer
    RMI server that creates a new RMI connection between server and client (server side)
    Server
    Server class that handles the connection with the clients.
    SocketConnection
    Socket connection between server and client (server side)
    SocketServer
    Socket server that creates a new socket connection between server and client (server side) that extends Thread so that it can run in parallel with the other threads
